sentence: The pool hot tub and restaurant was also great
Outside Amenities are outstanding pools work out room and the bar in front of the beach
So we love the grotto pool and the beautiful landscaped courtyard
The kids love the waterfall pool but also just the whole atmosphere of this place is lovely
Great hotelove the ocean view the kids love the different pools and water gamesclean rooms and friendly staff
It has an interesting layout it is beachfront and has nice pools
Lovely pools plenty of places to eat in the hotel
We loved that there is an Alvins Island Gift Shop right by the Rock Waterfall pool area it came in handy when we needed things
beach heat the pool with the waterfalls
Nice staff great pools super beach location
The rooms are ok need some renovating but the pools are nice
5 swimming pools and hot tubs open until 11 pm

I have read what others have posted do not belive anything till you get there The rooms are old but clean the pools are great is close to the beach and many other amenities staff great I had booked a room to the parking lot and change my mind to a pool side and they just did great service would comeback again

One of the nights on our recent visitfirst week of June there was a fireworks display put on by the Ramada which the kids loved and another night a projector and screen were set up at the pool to show Inside Out for the kids
The resort has a pool that is one of the best I have been to and it even has a bar in the middle of the pool
When we arrived we were told they pool and other amenities were under construction
When we got upstairs to our room there in the tower you will see the beautiful pool we saw
Pool areas and lobby along with restaurant is under renovation
The down side to the remodel was that the large awesome pool with the groto swim up bar waterfall etc was closed for renovations
The hotel has a younger kids splash area park it looked pretty fun and is a decent size but we did not use it much as the beach and the heated pool we found more fun

Let me tell you the pictures does NOT match the rooms the rooms are old and dirty and they need a major renovation The pool area is nice and clean but the water is too cold that ’s the reason the pool is not overcrowded hence the jacuzi is always full
Definitely polBar was n’t open in pool
He was very acomodating we had a voucher to get a pizza at The Grill located by the pool
Needs MAJOR renovation deep cleaning but great pool and outdoor facilities
The pool was wonderful but we did wish the swim up bar hours lasted longer
Old carpet and old looking bathroom and the bridge between room and pool looked old and not sturdy
The pool area was large enough that it never felt overcrowded and there were more than enough lounge chairs
We visited in March before and I thought it was normal for the pool to be cold because it is n’t heated but now in August it was still cold
You can swim up to a bar in the waterfall but we did not patronize it
Pros The outside pool beach area etc is pretty just like the pictures
